data.title: Paola Mori Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Paola Mori on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Paola Mori including Confidential Report.
data.text: Paola Mori made her mark in the world of entertainment when she worked on "Crossed Swords" (1954) with Errol Flynn. In 1959, she made her film debut in "Finishing School." In 1955, she appeared in "Confidential Report." In 1962, she had her final film role in "The Trial." Mori was married to Orson Welles.
